Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Accessibility

The Accessibility utility is to highlight elements that contain information that should be read by a screen reader and well as a keyboard short cut that can be used to skip to different areas of content.

Content that is visible to users with and without a screen reader

Content read by screen reader

Tab to reveal the Skip to main content link

Skip to main content 
<div class="p-4">
  <p>Content that is visible to users with and without a screen reader</p>
  <p class="show-for-screen-reader">Content read by screen reader</p>
</div>
<div class="p-4">
  <p>Tab to reveal the Skip to main content link</p><a class="show-for-keyboard" href="#main">Skip to main content</a>
</div>
